conflictDescription: User Story A requires ALFRED to suggest challenging exercises proactively, whereas User Story B forbids ALFRED from suggesting any activities unless explicitly asked, imposing opposite expectations on the system's behavior for the same operation of suggesting activities.
userStoryASummary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to suggest challenging exercises and personalized to-do lists that help me stay active and motivated while respecting my physical limits.
userStoryBSummary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to never suggest activities or exercises unless I explicitly ask, so I can avoid all challenging tasks and keep full control.
resolutionDescription: Applied a context-aware policy allowing ALFRED to suggest challenging exercises proactively only when users opt in, while respecting user control by not suggesting activities unless explicitly requested otherwise.
newUserStoryASummary: As an older adult interested in staying active, I want ALFRED to suggest challenging exercises proactively when I opt in, so that I stay motivated and healthy.
newUserStoryBSummary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to never suggest activities unless I explicitly ask, so that I keep full control over my tasks.
